The Sunrise Inn was a small and quiet inn that stood in the south-eastern edge of the city of Phlan in the Moonsea in the mid-to-late 14 century DR.
As of the , the inn did business in rebuilt Phlan after the defeat of Tyranthraxus a decade earlier. A single sign that hung over the inns door proclaimed the establishments name welcoming its guests.. The innkeep of Sunrise Inn offered free lodgings to respected individuals, such as the Heroes of Phlan.
